thread.title: DHS S&T Hosts Demonstration Day For First Accelerator Program, Focuses On Wearable Tech
thread.title_full: DHS S&T Hosts Demonstration Day For First Accelerator Program, Focuses On Wearable Tech

title: DHS S&T Hosts Demonstration Day For First Accelerator Program, Focuses On Wearable Tech
text:
28 DHS S&T Hosts Demonstration Day For First Accelerator Program, Focuses On Wearable Tech 
Homeland Security Today: This week, the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Science and Technology Directorate (S&T) held a demonstration day focusing on wearable technology for first responders to showcase a wide range of innovative technologies discovered through its first accelerator program, EMERGE.
